definition.description: Aqara temperature, humidity and pressure sensor

exposes.description: Voltage of the battery in millivolts
exposes.name: voltage

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for temperature, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_precision

options.description: Calibrates the temperature value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for humidity, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: humidity_precision

options.description: Calibrates the humidity value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: humidity_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for pressure, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: pressure_precision

options.description: Calibrates the pressure value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: pressure_calibration

exposes.description: Indicates if the contact is closed (= true) or open (= false)
exposes.name: contact

exposes.description: Voltage of the battery in millivolts
exposes.name: voltage

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for temperature, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_precision

options.description: Calibrates the temperature value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_calibration

definition.description: Aqara human body movement and illuminance sensor

exposes.description: Indicates whether the device detected occupancy
exposes.name: occupancy

exposes.description: Voltage of the battery in millivolts
exposes.name: voltage

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for temperature, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_precision

options.description: Calibrates the temperature value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for illuminance, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: illuminance_precision

options.description: Calibrates the illuminance value (percentual offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: illuminance_calibration

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for illuminance_lux, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: illuminance_lux_precision

options.description: Calibrates the illuminance_lux value (percentual offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: illuminance_lux_calibration

options.description: Time in seconds after which occupancy is cleared after detecting it (default 90 seconds).
options.name: occupancy_timeout

options.description: Sends a message the last time occupancy (occupancy: true) was detected. When setting this for example to [10, 60] a `{"no_occupancy_since": 10}` will be send after 10 seconds and a `{"no_occupancy_since": 60}` after 60 seconds.
options.name: no_occupancy_since

exposes.description: Indicates if the contact is closed (= true) or open (= false)
exposes.name: contact

exposes.description: Voltage of the battery in millivolts
exposes.name: voltage

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for temperature, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_precision

options.description: Calibrates the temperature value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_calibration

exposes.description: Indicates if the contact is closed (= true) or open (= false)
exposes.name: contact

exposes.description: Voltage of the battery in millivolts
exposes.name: voltage

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for temperature, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_precision

options.description: Calibrates the temperature value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_calibration

exposes.description: Indicates if the contact is closed (= true) or open (= false)
exposes.name: contact

exposes.description: Voltage of the battery in millivolts
exposes.name: voltage

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for temperature, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_precision

options.description: Calibrates the temperature value (absolute offset), takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: temperature_calibration

exposes.description: Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. make light blink for a few seconds)
exposes.name: effect

options.description: Controls the transition time (in seconds) of on/off, brightness, color temperature (if applicable) and color (if applicable) changes. Defaults to `0` (no transition).
options.name: transition

exposes.description: Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. make light blink for a few seconds)
exposes.name: effect

options.description: Controls the transition time (in seconds) of on/off, brightness, color temperature (if applicable) and color (if applicable) changes. Defaults to `0` (no transition).
options.name: transition

exposes.description: Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. make light blink for a few seconds)
exposes.name: effect

options.description: Controls the transition time (in seconds) of on/off, brightness, color temperature (if applicable) and color (if applicable) changes. Defaults to `0` (no transition).
options.name: transition

exposes.description: Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. make light blink for a few seconds)
exposes.name: effect

options.description: Controls the transition time (in seconds) of on/off, brightness, color temperature (if applicable) and color (if applicable) changes. Defaults to `0` (no transition).
options.name: transition

exposes.name: voltage

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for temperature, takes into effect on next report of device.

options.description: Number of digits after decimal point for illuminance, takes into effect on next report of device.
options.name: illuminance_precision

options.description: Set to false to disable the legacy integration (highly recommended), will change structure of the published payload (default true).
